title: Update frontend env.json BACKEND_CANISTER_ID for new backend canister deployment

requirements.summary: Update frontend env.json BACKEND_CANISTER_ID to the newly deployed backend canister ID
acceptanceCriteria: Running the existing preflight check (`runPreflightChecks` in `frontend/src/lib/goLivePreflight.ts`) no longer reports the failure: "BACKEND_CANISTER_ID is not defined in env.json".

file_operations.description: Replace the placeholder value "YOUR_BACKEND_CANISTER_ID_HERE" with the newly deployed backend canister ID for this deployment so preflight no longer flags BACKEND_CANISTER_ID as missing.

requirements.summary: Ensure go-live preflight and deployment flow proceeds successfully after env.json is updated
acceptanceCriteria: The go-live flow completes successfully end-to-end (no failed step in the deployment sequence).
Admin Go Live page no longer blocks deployment due to missing `BACKEND_CANISTER_ID`.

file_operations.description: Harden BACKEND_CANISTER_ID validation by normalizing the loaded env.json value (e.g., handle non-string and trim whitespace) before placeholder/empty checks, so a valid newly pasted canister ID is reliably accepted and English-only messaging remains unchanged.
